entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
